Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' compared to 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' out of all rejection activities
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' that are followed by 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' from all final decision activities ('Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR', 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' in relation to the total number of declarations processed
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases where '' does not happen

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' followed by 'Request Payment'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' with amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' by 'STAFF MEMBER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' that lead to a 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' done by 'SYSTEM'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' activities == 'SYSTEM' where ma is the last value of org:resource

Name: Ratio of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' over 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Occasions how often 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' is performed compared to 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: The ratio of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' that are not eventually performed compared to those that lead to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' per year
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' activities

Name: Average number of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' in a month
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR'
